actions-list.actionItem: The House convened, returning from a recess continuing the legislative day of January 3.
The Speaker announced that the House do now recess. The next meeting is subject to the call of the Chair.

Pursuant to section 2 of the Civil Rights Commission Amendments Act of 1994 (42 U.S.C. 1975), and the order of the House of January 4, 2021, the Speaker appointed Mr. Mondaire Jones, White Plains, New York, for a term expiring December 15, 2028.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from North Carolina, Mr. Butterfield, and the gentleman from Pennsylvania, Mr. Doyle, the whole number of the House is 429.
The House received a communication from Representative Doyle, Michael F. wherein he resigns as a member of the House of Representatives effective on December 31, 2022.
The Chair designated Mr. Peters to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 6 of H. Res. 1529, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Diana DeGette to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
